name: Purrty Diva Leopard Rainbow Mini Bows 3-pack
description:
Leopard rainbow print polyester mini bows measuring approximately 1.75" x 1.25", attached to a ribbon-lined, 2" snap clip. Decorated with skull resin. 3-pack. Skulls are each pink, hot pink and white.

Colors may be slightly different than they appear in the photos. We try our best to provide you with our best possible images. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at customerservice@purrtydiva.com or use the contact form.

WARNING! Choking Hazard; Small parts; Not for children under 3 years.

HAPPY SHOPPING!

name: Purrty Diva Large Leopard Print Hair Bow
description:
Large, 5" x 4" cotton fabric, leopard print fabric hair bow in Hot Pink or Turquoise. 

Either on a 2.25" ribbon-lines alligator clip or a 2.25" French barrette. Your choice.

Colors may be slightly different than they appear in the photos. We try our best to provide you with our best possible images. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at customerservice@purrtydiva.com or use the contact form.

WARNING! Choking Hazard; Small parts; Not for children under 3 years.

HAPPY SHOPPING!

name: Customizable Purrty Diva Solid Color Single Hair Bows
description:
Get your Purrty on!! With these 3.5" x 1.5" solid color single bow tie hair bows, attached to a ribbon-lined, 1.75 inch metal alligator clip with slip grip. Available in 22 soft and bold colors.

Colors may be slightly different than they appear in the photos. We try our best to provide you with our best images. More colors available other that the ones shown in the photo. Please see our "Options" drop-down list or the color chart provided, for a more detailed color list. We apologize, more photos to come. Should you have any questions please email customerservice@purrtydiva.com or use the contact form.

The colors on the list are default. If you prefer a custom color mix of any of two color options available in the options list, please make sure you note your color choices when completing your purchase. 

Example: Emerald bow with black center.

WARNING! Choking Hazard; Small parts; Not for children under 3 years.

HAPPY SHOPPING!

name: Customizable Purrty Diva Solid Color Double Hair Bows
description:
Get your Purrty on!! With these 3.5" x 3" attached to a polyester grosgrain ribbon-lined, 1.75 inch metal alligator clip with slip grip. Available in 22 soft and bold colors.

Colors may be slightly different than they appear in the photos. We try our best to provide you with our best images. More colors available other that the ones shown in the photo. Please see our "Options" drop-down list or the color chart provided, for a more detailed color list. We apologize, more photos to come. 

The colors on the list are default. If you prefer a custom color mix of any of two color options available in the options list, please be sure to note your color choices when completing your purchase, and we'll be happy to customize your bows. 

Example: Emerald bow with black center.

WARNING! Choking Hazard; Small parts; Not for children under 3 years.

HAPPY SHOPPING!

name: Purrty Diva Polka Dot Single Hair Bows
description:
Get your Purrty on with these lovely, 3.5" x 1.5" polka dot single hair bows. Attached to a ribbon-lined, 1.75" metal alligator clip with slip grip. 

Colors may be slightly different than they appear in the photos. We try our best to provide you with our best images. 

Should you have any questions please email customerservice@purrtydiva.com before ordering.

The color options in the drop-down list are defaulted. Centers are customizable in solid poppy red, white, black, light orchid, pink, etc. If you prefer a custom color mix of any of the color options available, select "Custom Colors". Please make sure to note your color choices when completing your purchase, and we'll be happy to customize your bows.

Example:black/white dots-poppy red center, purple/white dots-light orchid center.

WARNING! Choking Hazard; Small parts; Not for children under 3 years.

Happy Shopping!

name: Zebra Print Double Hair Bows
description:
Compliment your favorite hair style with this, 3.5" x 3" Zebra Print Double Hair Bow! This polyester grosgrain hair bow is attached to a ribbon-lined, 1.75" metal alligator clip with slip grip. Vibrant and very nice colors! All bows have a black ribbon center. Also available (but not pictured) in white.

Colors may be slightly different than they appear in the photos. We try our best to provide you with our best possible images. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at customerservice@purrtydiva.com or use the contact form.

WARNING! Choking Hazard; Small parts; Not for children under 3 years.

HAPPY SHOPPING!
